alert.note: Alert for Benton; Sherburne; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 12:23AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Benton, northwestern Sherburne and northeastern Stearns Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Foley, or 8 miles northeast of St. Cloud, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Foley around 1235 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 158 and 160. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 166 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and east central Minnesota.
